snippet: Saudi Arabia’s official news agency says private girls’ schools are now allowed to hold sports activities in the kingdom, “according to the rules of Shariah.”
lead_paragraph: Saudi Arabia’s official news agency says private girls’ schools are now allowed to hold sports activities in the kingdom, “according to the rules of Shariah.”

headline.main: Saudis Allow Sports for Some Schoolgirls
headline.print_headline: Saudis Allow Sports For Some Schoolgirls
